snippet: Russia’s Supreme Court on Tuesday reduced by two months the sentence of Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, the former oil tycoon and political opponent of President Vladimir V. Putin.
abstract: Russia’s Supreme Court reduces by two months sentence of Mikhail B Khodorkovsky, former oil tycoon and political opponent of President Vladimir V Putin, but declines to release him immediately as his lawyers had requested in an appeal.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s Supreme Court on Tuesday reduced by two months the sentence of Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, the former oil tycoon and political opponent of President Vladimir V. Putin.

headline.main: Russia: Tycoon’s Prison Sentence Is Cut by Two Months
headline.print_headline: Russia: Tycoon’s Prison Sentence Is Cut by Two Months
